channel.title: Vps on Runescape Bot Spot
channel.description: Recent content in Vps on Runescape Bot Spot

item.title: How to Setup a Tier.net VPS for Runescape Botting
item.description: Virtual private servers (or VPSs) are commonly used by Runescape goldfarmers as a cost effective way to expand their botfarms. You can think of a VPS as a remote computer that you rent.

item.title: How to Unlock Your Runescape Bot Account
item.description:
If you’ve tried your hand at goldfarming, you’ve probably experienced getting some of your accounts getting locked shorty after tutorial island.

Locked Runescape Account

After seeing this, many people assume the account is banned or useless, and continue creating more accounts. But that’s not the case! This guide will cover how to get your Runescape bot account unlocked (not unbanned) and continue botting.
